name: Dudunsparce
flavorText: This Pokémon uses its hard tail to make its nest by boring holes into bedrock deep underground. The nest can reach lengths of over six miles.

previous.name: Farigiraf
previous.flavorText: Now that the brain waves from the head and tail are synced up, the psychic power of this Pokémon is 10 times stronger than Girafarig’s.

next.name: Kingambit
next.flavorText: Only a Bisharp that stands above all others in its vast army can evolve into Kingambit.
